Watch: Car engulfed in flames on Waikato Expresswayhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-car-engulfed-in-flames-on-waikato-expressway/Y4D3AHPZQVEHLPODOWDSUPHHEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-car-engulfed-in-flames-on-waikato-expressway/Y4D3AHPZQVEHLPODOWDSUPHHEM/ Rachel MaherIt is not known how the fire began and it took firefighters close to an hour to extinguish Mon, 20 Nov 2023 08:20:51 +0000 The burning car was near the Tahuna off-ramp on the Waikato Expressway, State Highway 1.

Israel-Hamas war: NZ Jewish community feels ‘vulnerable’ after failure of civic leaders to condemn swastika graffiti and rhetoric https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-nz-jewish-community-feels-vulnerable-after-failure-of-civic-leaders-to-condemn-swastika-graffiti-and-言辞/SWMAVTN3X5HFBHZ7F7PCYBPSIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-nz-jewish-community-feels-vulnerable-after-failure-of-civic-leaders-to-condemn-swastika-graffiti-and-言辞/SWMAVTN3X5HFBHZ7F7PCYBPSIE/ It comes a week after a statue of a Jewish ex-Auckland mayor was defaced with a swastika. Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:47:16 +0000 A statue of former Auckland Mayor Sir Dove-Myer Robinson in Aotea Square was vandalised with a swastika.

Rotorua coronial inquest: Shargin Stephens was ‘actively’ targeted for investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-coronial-inquest-shargin-stephens-was-actively-targeted-for-investigation/MZSCESJQLFHMFGHRCYRAVBNEF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-coronial-inquest-shargin-stephens-was-actively-targeted-for-investigation/MZSCESJQLFHMFGHRCYRAVBNEF4/ Maryana Garcia'With that criminal group, our priority was to actually get them off the street.' Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:09:07 +0000 Shargin Stephens was shot by police on July 14, 2016. He died 12 days later in hospital.
